name: Amelia Morales
description: It is my first bike and as a person who was upgrading from an Activa, this felt just perfect for me...It is a Beginner friendly machine.

name: Joanne Perez
description: Riding experience is just out of the world...This bike along with its sibling the GS310 has got the best seats on a single cylinder bike

name: Jan Daniels
description: Looks were the first thing that caught my attention...I can't just define how beautiful this bike is... Performance is just mind blowing.

name: Jon Grant
description: Maintenance is a bit on the expensive side as compared to other single cylinder bikes and some twin cylinder bikes

name: Jerald Fitzgerald
description: These guys are the best! I highly recommend them!! Honest, reliable, thorough and professional.

name: Lisa Barnett
description: I don't have much on Pros cause I have already said that, but some of the one down sides I have noticed is that
